website_summaries.verdict: If you want a secure gun safe and don't want to deal with batteries, this is an ideal choice.
pros: Secure because it's easy to bolt down and hard to open without combination
Totally mechanical, so no need to worry about batteries
cons: Mechanical lock works quickly, but a biometric one works considerably faster
Enough room for a full size pistol, some ammo and a spare magazine, but that's about it

customer_reviews.title: Customer satisfaction 101
customer_reviews.text: This thing is built like a tank! Delivered sooner than expected and in perfect condition. Unfortunately, I wasn't able to immediately enjoy this awesome safe... I ran into some issues setting the combination so I called Dean Safe and spoke to a safe expert about my issue. After troubleshooting and stumping him, he immediately sent a FedEx return label so he could replace mine because there may have been a manufacturing defect. Either way, I appreciate the courtesy and professionalism.
customer_reviews.author: David Hamill

customer_reviews.title: Lock Problem
customer_reviews.text: The only problem was with the locking mechanism. The lock had two or three buttons which would continually stick causing very inconsistent unlocking . I called Fort Know to see if i could lube the system. They said it appeared to be a defective lock and return safe to vendor and ask them to send back to manufacture. I returned the safe for refund. Did not order another one. I went a different direction. I did not want to take a chance on another one. I was disappointed because I liked ever thing except the lock.
customer_reviews.author: meoute

customer_reviews.title: Old school is the best bet for a handgun safe
customer_reviews.text: WHY oh why did I ever mess with electronic handgun safes. I didn't replace my battery as I should have on my last Gun Vault safe, couldn't find the key, so pried it open with vice grips and a screwdriver in 10 minutes to get my pistol out. You will NOT be able to do that with the Fort Knox, it's much more substantial construction. And no battery maintenance for those of us that tend to blow that off. This one is my closet carry gun safe, I'll be replacing my sometimes-reliable bedside biometric safe with the top opening version of this one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank, keeps guns out of children's hands
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has no batteries to worry about, easy to "program", multiple-button punches are allowed, very heavily-constructed, very spacious inside with durable carpet. The only con is that if you close the door very hard, it will stick a lot the next time you go to open it. I used to use a Gunvault Mini, and was always a little worried about the fact that it was battery-powered. And then the lock broke on it, which as it turns out is very common with those safes. I like this safe much, much more. The quality and peace of mind are well worth the slightly higher cost.
customer_reviews.author: Lurinda

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for putting on a shelf and still allowing for things to put on the Shelf around it unlike some other gun safes with a doors at an angle or on top. I love that it's a mechanical lock mechanism that I never have to worry about batteries or electrical failures. I would have given it five stars but like a few other people I had a sticky button that I feel should have been caught by the Quality Control process before it made it to my doorstep.
customer_reviews.author: Brook Buechner

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid. If you can accept risk, get a cheaper one. Pick this one for confident reliability.
customer_reviews.text: I spent some time trying to decide on what would be the perfect safe. There are some cheaper options, but on a recommendation from a friend I went with this one. Zero regrets. Fits perfectly on my nightstand, my Sig P320 with attachments fits easily inside with room for extra magazines, and the safe itself is rock solid. The buttons work flawlessly everytime, and I feel confident that when I need to open it, it will open. No poor quality components and no dead batteries. Good old made in the USA feels good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jared H.

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid, easy to use and can set multi-button combinations
customer_reviews.text: Solid 10g steel construction, easy instructions for using and changing the combination, and enough room for 2 full sized handguns plus a few magazines. The mechanical lock gives me great peace of mind for quickly accessing the contents without risk of failure, which is possible with cheaper electronic locks. Mounting was simple as well with the provided sizing specs for the correct bolt size. I would recommend this safe to anyone looking for a highly secure handgun safe that doesn't rely on electronics or tubular back up locks. Favorite feature is the ability to set multi-button combinations... meaning buttons 1 and 5 can be pressed simultaneously as a single step in the combo.
customer_reviews.author: Unl_cky

customer_reviews.title: solid reliable safe
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy, solid safe with a reliable, mechanical push-button keypad. I have had it for a few months and have used it weekly, to get used to it. So far, the buttons feel very solid and reliable, with no issues with the lock. It easily fits my full size 9mm and extra mag, with room to spare. It has carpeted interior, and very quiet operation. I did not want to rely on any electrical lock issues/biometric crap or beeping noises with the other powered safes. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A.

customer_reviews.title: I love them! I used to have the digital button ...
customer_reviews.text: These are tanks, I love them! I used to have the digital button press kind, but they had a phantom power draw, so you would have to replace your batteries (8 of them) once a year. I always had the worry in the back of my mind that the battery would be dead when I absolutely needed to open the safe. It bothered me enough that I switched to this mechanical version. It works every time, feels solid and gives me 100% peace of mind. I liked the first so much, I ordered a second.
customer_reviews.author: CSherr

customer_reviews.title: No batteries for this safe.  Yeh!
customer_reviews.text: Safe itself of great quality. Older ones like this had to be manually opened after unlocking but this one has a spring loaded door. I like that. I ONLY use Simplex locks. They have been great over the years and are simple and durable. Whenever I really need something to work that requires a battery, it seems that the battery is always then dead. I know change them out every year and I try but you know how that goes. As far as the business selling the safe, I had no issues. The safe was well packaged and briskly sent.
customer_reviews.author: 308mgmd

customer_reviews.title: The safe came pretty quickly and the instructions to personalize the combination were ...
customer_reviews.text: The safe came pretty quickly and the instructions to personalize the combination were very easy to follow. I bolted it easily inside my night table using 1.5 " 5/16 bolts x 4 with coarse locking nuts and washers. It holds my CCW, 2 extra mags with room for other small objects. I don't want it cluttered so I have clear access. The door opens out so I can place items back in my night table and not compromise easy access to the door. I didn't give a 5 because I had to go to hardware store to get bolts, but I can understand why they don't since people may want to customize what they use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I own TWO (2) of this Fort Knox safe
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Fort Nox I have purchased since I got into firearms last May (2016). The safe is well-built, sturdy, secure (imagine the number of combinations possible!) and simple. Best of all - it does not rely on any form of batteries, electronics, RFI, biometrics, etc. that could likely fail in the event when #SHTF. Might be pricier that those you would find in Walmart, Home Depot, etc. but then again, there is no compromise on the security of my firearms.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy pistol safe!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pistol safe - solid, rugged, and secure while still allowing fast access via the simplex lock. I'm very happy with it and have no complaints. The seller was Dean Safe Company, who were outstanding. I ordered it on a Sunday night and received it Tuesday morning! When I had a question about the safe, Dean Safe's support people were quick to respond and very helpful. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sundial

customer_reviews.title: Fits Glock 40 with room to spare.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. It is great because you can so easily program the combination to something easy for you to use, but practically impossible for anyone else to accidentally open. Fits well on a high shelf. You can keep it out of reach of children, but protect your family if needed. Also in this case, it fits a fully loade also in this case, it fits a glock 40 with 2 10mm double stack magazines with ease. The sock is a nice ad on.
customer_reviews.author: pete_009

customer_reviews.title: Safe safe
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any guns, but this is one impressive little safe! I love that it's "manual"...no batteries to go dead, no 'beeping' to annoy. And with the ability to change to over 1000 different combinations, it's just what I needed! I use it to store my meds, but it could be used for anything not too large. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: CelticJade

customer_reviews.title: Good safe that doesn't need batteries
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heavy-steel safe that can be bolted down. No batteries needed. The keypad is the non-electric type that I see in places like airport gates that don't have power. Easy to program and easy to open quickly, but it seems quite secure. Will operate in a horizontal position or vertically with the door on top. The inside has light padding to protect the items you put in. The interior space is about 10 by 8 1/2 by 3 1/2 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well-made safe that feels reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Solid, well-made safe that feels reliable. This safe is very well made and is the 3rd gun safe I own. I own gun safes from 3 of the major manufacturers and believe this Fort Knox safe is world-class in construction. The mechanical safe buttons provide very positive feedback and the metal that the safe is made of feels very high quality. It has some heft to the safe, which is exactly what you want in a gun safe.
customer_reviews.author: OC

customer_reviews.title: this seemed the best simple small hand gun safe
customer_reviews.text: Did my research, this seemed the best simple small hand gun safe. It is just that. No bells and whistles, but that's a good thing in my book. Bells and whistles require batteries, batteries go dead. Don't waste your time/money with any battery operated junk like I did a few years ago. This just works flawlessly, every time, no electrics, and no annoying beeps. This thing does the job intended. This is a heavy, solid, American made safe. In other words, I really like this safe. And thank you Dean Safe Co for the super fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: RJL

customer_reviews.title: Extremely secure and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day and don't see any possible signs of wear or weak points. The safe guy on youtube recommends this so you know it's good.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Secure, Solid
customer_reviews.text: A very simple and secure pistol box. I love the mechanical lock and lack of batteries. Fits perfectly on my closet shelf. Does not suffer from the same security vulnerabilities that many of the cheaper electronic lock boxes suffer from.
customer_reviews.author: A Reason

customer_reviews.title: The little safe works great, is easily concealed and the mechanical lock makes ...
customer_reviews.text: Put it in the work truck under the backseat to lock wallet away during jobs. The little safe works great, is easily concealed and the mechanical lock makes it very nice...i love not having to worry about batteries.
customer_reviews.author: roger mccullough

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the quality and everything about the box I had to return it because it has no fire rating. I was super bummed
customer_reviews.author: Monica Wolan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Love that its a simplex lock with no electronics involved. But I do think these are overpriced given their simplicity. Needs to come with bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan N. Mckinnis

customer_reviews.title: Quality safe
customer_reviews.text: Awesome small safe, solid thick steel. Easy to use mechanical lock
customer_reviews.author: AndyPop

customer_reviews.title: Solid, strong safe
customer_reviews.text: Received order as told when it would arrive. Well packed and protected. Very heavy gauge metal and solid material. The combination re-setting was easy to accomplish and works well. Very satisfied with my choice and recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Well built!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this safe for awhile now and it hold 2 pistols easily. Really well made and great instructions on securing it.
customer_reviews.author: James A Summers

customer_reviews.title: By far the best of small easy to access safes
customer_reviews.text: Door is spring loaded so as soon as you open the lock the door pushes up.
customer_reviews.author: Grover Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: A strong, simple safe. The lock is well built and simple to use. I saw a YouTube video about some poor tolerances a couple of years ago, but mine was great. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Best money I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Best money I ever spent. If you have a need for something like this, purchase this one. You will not regret it. I keep the keys to the metal gun cabinet I have that contains all my long guns and accessories in this little Fort Knox Personal Handgun Safe along with (1) loaded handgun. I don't have to worry about my young children finding the keys to the gun cabinet or my loaded handgun. I'm very happy with the quality of this American-made product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love simplex locks. Combine that with Fort Knox product. God damn I love my safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Talluto

customer_reviews.title: Great safe for a handgun.
customer_reviews.text: I love this safe. It easily fits a pistol and several magazines, and can be bolted down if desired. It is very quick to open.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Satko

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable piece of hardware. Pricey yes, but worth it. I keep money, silver and my Glock in there! Bolted down to floor.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: built like a tank.
customer_reviews.text: This safe is Heavy and built Solid. some have complained the combo was hard to change but I had no problems with changing the numbers myself.
customer_reviews.author: H Crow

customer_reviews.title: Great safe
customer_reviews.text: Lock works great. Safe is built to last. Would like to see some softer padding but all in all I'm 100 percent happy and confident with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, well built safe.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, well built safe. I like the mechanical Simplex lock. My preference after having trouble with battery powered pistol boxes not working 100% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: ncsReview

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I mounted it sideways and would have ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I mounted it sideways and would have given it 5 stars if the spring in door were strong enough to hold it all the way open. The door sags down a little and has to be held open to remove gun. I like the fabric interior. My wife made a shelf that I was able to velcro to the sides to hold ammo.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe Great Comapnay
customer_reviews.text: The Fort Knox safe I purchased from Dean Safe Company exceeded my expectations. It was delivered ahead of the expected date, and was packaged very well. The Safe is the highest quality hand gun safe I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C. Huber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping loaded handgun on nightstand without worrying about children getting to it.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a handgun.
customer_reviews.text: Great little lock box; not a safe by any stretch. Will deter most children and casual crooks. Bolt it down, and don't keep anything too valuable in it. Perfect for firearms.
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: Dean Safe was great to deal with
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a finicky biometric safe with this. It is heavy, well made and quick to access. Dean Safe was great to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Solid little safe
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid little safe that comfortably fits a handgun with some elbow room to spare
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: and he has been very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I've a friend who bought the same safe several years ago, and he has been very happy with it. Based on this, I bought the same one, and I'm very satisfied with the quality of the product. It's exactly as described. Thank you for marketing this great product!
customer_reviews.author: Martin E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best personal safe out there!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent pistol safe, and the no-pry design is ingenious. Love the Simplex lock mechanism which is very easy to reset combo. Bought this as a Christmas gift for my ex-wife. She loves it too. I'll definitely be ordering one for myself. Maybe a couple more!
customer_reviews.author: hugh

customer_reviews.title: Good safe for safety and quick access.
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this safe. It opens efficiently all the time. It looks pretty good for a shelf safe.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Another great purchase from Dean safe and of course Fort Knox.Sturdy safe,fast shipping, excellent transaction.
customer_reviews.author: TROY V

customer_reviews.title: This is the second safe I purchased from these folks ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second safe I purchased from these folks. This is a very high quality safe and the company that makes them is first rate...period!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great safe
customer_reviews.text: Solid and sturdy safe. Easy to install and reset combination. Just make sure the buttons pop up when you enter the code. Recommend using dean safe for purchase. Reliable and speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: L J Fliegelman

customer_reviews.title: Well made and worth it for child's safety
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, heavy and easy to set the combination. Very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Renee

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly, as described, good instructions for use and setting/resetting combo. Recommend this safe.
customer_reviews.author: FSUMD2014

customer_reviews.title: Great Company
customer_reviews.text: Great safe, fits perfectly in the spot we needed it. Came when expected, love the sock it came with, plus you can't beat FREE shipping!
customer_reviews.author: David Stringfellow

customer_reviews.title: So far love the safe
customer_reviews.text: So far love the safe. Much more substantial than the GunVault that I had for years and required yearly battery changes. The safe arrived early and with no damage. I would consider Dean Safe Company again.
customer_reviews.author: James W Brown

customer_reviews.title: Lock works very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Just what I expected. Lock works very nice.
customer_reviews.author: FoPo6

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice little safe. Opens easily even when mounted upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. White

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great safe! Quick access, secure locking mechanism, and really solid construction. Big enough for a Glock 17, and a magazine and cuff case combo. Bought 2 in March of 2016. No issues with loose buttons as in previous reviews.
customer_reviews.author: JSlocum

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY. Was exactly what I was looking for in ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY HAPPY. Was exactly what I was looking for in a handgun safe. Keep it on my desk, and easily fits my FNX Tactical .45, two magazines, wallet, and a couple sets of keys. Plan on buying another very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A Farris

customer_reviews.title: Great pistol safe  ( keep it safe and secure )
customer_reviews.text: Great personal handgun safe well made no batteries to run out great locking system. I'm telling everyone how great this safe is to keep your gun safe and secure from anyone
customer_reviews.author: Steve Brody

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This safe is the perfect size to hold my compact 9mm and a magazine. If it's nicely onto a hidden shelf in my closet. Package arrived on time and with the appropriate amount of packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Quality gun vault
customer_reviews.text: Solid, well-made gun vault. Combination is easy to set and use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. Was initially sent the incorrect item ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Was initially sent the incorrect item, and they quickly swapped out for the correct item. No worries...

customer_reviews.title: Great gun safe
customer_reviews.text: Great gun safe. Plenty of room for a 9mm and a couple of extra mags. Like the fact of no batteries needed or beeping buttons to draw attention.
customer_reviews.author: rob713

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good. High level of security for a pistol box
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. High level of security for a pistol box. Mounts easily. Setting a new combination is also a breeze. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i was looking for. No electronics and with a little practice, i can have it open in under 4 seconds . Great product

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: It was a quick delivery. The product seems to work very well. I am very satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Great safe I can fit 2 regular size pistol and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great safe I can fit 2 regular size pistol and one small or 2 regular and clips. very easy to put in new code. I do recommend this safe.

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Solid!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted: simple, solid and SAFE! No batteries to maintain or keys to misplace. Less is more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid and simple little gun safe.
customer_reviews.text: Mounted it on a shelf so it's accessible and quick to open. The little Fort Knox safe does what I need it to do, so no complaints.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality heavy guage. Not like the cheaper gun vault boxes on the merket.

customer_reviews.title: If you want the best, look no further
customer_reviews.text: First Rate pistol safe. If you want the best, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the purchase. It works great. Quick delivery, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: An excellent handgun safe
customer_reviews.text: This is the only handgun safe I would own. No batteries. Excellent mechanical Lock system (very easy to set combinations). Quick entry. Highly secure and very strong build. I have three of them spread around my property for convenience and quick access if needed. I have had a couple other battery operated models and they were highly unreliable and a big hassle to program the combinations every time the batteries went out. This is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: P. H.

customer_reviews.title: Solid work, Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This thing is as solid as one must expect from the company, and it has a beautiful heft to it [though now, of course, it's bolted down]. Nothing, short of sitting on my floor and trying all the combinations possible is going to get it open unless the thief brings a cutting torch, and if that happens, I have bigger problems. The customer service is even better. My express thanks to Phil at Dean Safe for so cheerfully helping me through my issue with the carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith B.

customer_reviews.title: Great safe
customer_reviews.text: Great safe, super durable and very easy to program and operate. Fits perfectly on a shelf!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly as needed and envisioned. Very satisfied. Customer service excellent.

customer_reviews.title: Best safe on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best safe on the market. I even bought a full size gun dare from them. Hands down the best.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This safe is exactly what I was looking for, and it was shipped quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Love the safe and the fact that its manual and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the safe and the fact that its manual and does not rely on batteries. Fits 2 pistols and extra mags just fine. Only drawback is that it sticks a bit when shutting it. Have to firmly push the door in to close it, but it opens easily.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Fort Knox Manual Lock Handgun Safe
customer_reviews.text: Quality product exactly as described. Very easy to secured using the 4 pre-drilled holes. After reading the pros/cons of finger scanning versus manual locking methods I choose the Fort Knox manual lock safe. I found the Fort Knox lock easy to use quickly, and the instructions were spot on to change the combo first try. I am very satisfied with whole experience with this vendor. Craig
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: The safe seems great so far. It took me a bit to understand the directions on how the code works but I figure that out. The safe also came missing one of the plastic pieces that generally cover the drill holes in the bottom. I am OCD and that will always bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Weston

customer_reviews.title: Well built.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these we have bought. Well constructed, can be bolted down and the combination is easy to use quickly. Plenty of room for a handgun, a couple of magazines and tactical light. Allows you to have protection is various locations but locked up and easy to access.
customer_reviews.author: S Otree

product_meta.title: Fort Knox Personal Handgun Safe PB4 + Free Dean Safe 13.5" Pistol Sock
product_meta.description: Strength and Reliability are two words that best describe this beautifully crafted Fort Knox Personal Pistol Safe. With a thick 10-gauge steel body and a 3/16" tamper-resistant door this safe is not only practically impossible to break open but it would be insanely difficult to even dent this bad boy. The heavy duty tamper-resistant hinge is placed under the door to protect it from attack. It features the tried and true Simplex push-button mechanical lock which is fast and easy to use with the potential of 1,081 different combinations. The antique silver powder coat finish gives a durable yet beautiful look that creates a sense of strength and quality. The interior is carpet lined to help protect your valuables and guns from damage or scratches. You can easily fit 1 or 2 compact guns in this handgun safe. The pre-drilled holes in the bottom make it convenient to be bolted down to the floor, a drawer, or any other flat surface. These pistol boxes come with a manufacturer's lifetime warranty and surpasses the California Department of Justice firearm safety device requirements proving its extreme quality. This Fort Knox Personal Pistol Box is truly the best bang for your buck!
feature_bullets: Simplex Mechanical Lock with 1,081 Different Combinations
Carpet Lined Interior with Four Pre-Drilled Bolt Down Holes
Durable antique silver textured powder coat finish
Made in USA with a Lifetime Warranty
